sentences.sContent: They range widely in search of carrion.
sentences.sContent_eng: They range widely in search of carrion.
sentences.sCn: 它们在广阔的区域内搜寻腐肉。

sentences.sContent: Proletarian, be aware of the raid to the USSR planned by the carrion crows!
sentences.sContent_eng: Proletarian, be aware of the raid to the USSR planned by the carrion crows!
sentences.sCn: 无产者们，要看到由吃腐肉的乌鸦计划的突袭苏联行动！

remMethod.val: carr ( = carn， 肉) + ion → 腐肉

trans.tranOther: the decaying flesh of dead animals, which is eaten by some animals and birds
